content.raw:
I put it into integration because my first thought was to go all the way to checking if the model was spawned correctly with OGRE but in the end “got lazy” and only tested the merge.

You have a good point, I had a look at the ColladaLoader unit tests and since they are also about making sure that collada meshes are loaded and processed correctly it sounds like that’s the best place to put it?

‌
